oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Grace Evangelical Church, 2001 December
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photograph of Grace Evangelical Church, currently an Ethiopian Christian church located at 3701 Park Avenue in Nashville, Tennessee. Formerly the historic Park Avenue Church of Christ, this church building changed hands in 1993, becoming Korean Hanvit Baptist Church. In 2001 the name changed again to Grace Evangelical Church and the building became home to its current Ethiopian Christian congregation. The foundation is brick. The exterior walls are brick with stone accents. The roof is gabled and made of tar shingles. The windows are a combination of frosted glass and clear glass, and also include storm windows. The doors are wooden and metal with glass windows. Forms part of the Historic Nashville, Inc. Sacred Sites Survey Project. 1 photograph : col. ; 4 x 6 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Grace Evangelical Church (Nashville, Tenn.); Park Avenue Church of Christ (Nashville, Tenn.); Korean Hanvit Baptist Church (Nashville, Tenn.)
